about_the_game:
Complete missions to save a world devastated by zombies, utilizing Arm Units and special abilities! Throw Anything: Radiation Zombies is a third-person shooter 3D-action roguelite game set in a world overrun by zombies, where you survive by throwing objects around. Equip a powerful Arm Unit, enhance yourself with a personalized skill tree, and explore a maze-like world!

■ Combine various items obtained in the field to engage in battles in diverse ways!


■ If there are no nearby objects to throw, try to reverse challenging situations through unique skills!


■ Defeat zombies, earn points, and strengthen your character in your own style!


■ Find hidden secret rooms on each map and enhance your character!


■ Clear the story and meet various Characters!
